typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 derive(GENERO = "FEMENINO") ~> DerivedColumn2
source2 derive(GENERO = "MASCULINO") ~> DerivedColumn3
